thread.title: 18 Times Leslie Knope And Ann Perkin's Friendship Made Your Heart Smile
thread.title_full: 18 Times Leslie Knope And Ann Perkin's Friendship Made Your Heart Smile

author: Casey Rackham
title: 18 Times Leslie Knope And Ann Perkin's Friendship Made Your Heart Smile
text:
ID: 10382157 2. When they took a comfy cat nap together. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382056 3. When Ann was kind of there for Leslie. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382064 4. When Leslie had one of her amazing compliments for Ann… View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382082 5. …and when she had an even better one. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382055 6. When Leslie used Ann’s argument against her. View this image ›
NBC Ann: You made me watch all 8 Harry Potter movies. I don’t even like Harry Potter !
Leslie: That’s insane! You love Harry Potter ! You’ve seen all 8 movies.
ID: 10382059 7. When they wore matching hats. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382072 8. When Ann wasn’t above pranks. View this image ›
NBC Ann: I love her so much. But I think I’m going to draw a mustache on her face.
ID: 10382062 9. When Ann offered to defend Leslie no matter what… NBC
NBC
 Ann: But most importantly, you say the word, and I will beat her senseless with a baseball bat.
ID: 10382152 10. And when Leslie promised the same in return. View this image ›
NBC Leslie: Oh then I’m sure he’s not cheating on you. And if he is, he’s a monster. And if he’s not, you guy are great together. But if he is, I will kill him.
ID: 10382086 11. When they came up with a bunch of rhymes that explain their friendship. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382057 12. When Leslie went calendar crazy. View this image ›
NBC Ann: Talk Like a Pittsburgh Pirate Day. Which…why? And how?
ID: 10382058 13. When Leslie needed Ann more than anything. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382083 14. When Ann was there to take care of Leslie. NBC
NBC
 Ann: At one point I thought she was up, but then she went right back to sleep.
ID: 10382166 15. And again when she was there to help her BFF during her sugar crash. View this image ›
NBC Leslie: There’s some secret ingredient in these Nutri-Yum bars that makes me feel so good.
Ann: Sugar. It’s a block of sugar.
ID: 10382066 16. When Ann was trying to be supportive but Leslie called her out. View this image ›
NBC Ann: Everybody brings their own unique strengths to the table.
Leslie: You shut your mouth. You have ALL the strengths.
ID: 10382085 17. When Ann was more important than literally everyone else. NBC
NBC
 Ann: Hi!
Leslie: Oh, Ann’s here! Ann.
ID: 10382107 18. And finally, when they said “I love you” and really, really meant it. View this image ›
NBC ID: 10382075
